source_item.name: Greater Rune of the Void Ritual

effects.display_string: Set: Each time you take damage you have a chance to cast Metamorphosis for 4 sec and gain Luck of the Draw! which increases your damage dealt by 15% for 10 sec.
Set: The Hunt has a high chance to refresh its cooldown when you gain Luck of the Draw!

Set: The Hunt has a high chance to refresh its cooldown when you gain Luck of the Draw!

spells.description:
Equip: Taking damage has a chance to grant you an Adrenal Surge, causing you to gain 3,151 Agility and lose 310 Mastery for 12 sec.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Burning Blade Devotee's Cinch

effects.display_string: Set: Each time you take damage you have a chance to cast Metamorphosis for 4 sec and gain Luck of the Draw! which increases your damage dealt by 15% for 10 sec.
Set: The Hunt has a high chance to refresh its cooldown when you gain Luck of the Draw!

name: The Jastor Diamond

spells.description: Equip: Take Credit for your allies' deeds up to once every 12 sec, gaining 81 of their highest secondary stat up to 10 times until shortly after leaving combat. You have a 10% chance to get caught in the act, transferring all accumulated Credit to your ally for 15 sec instead.

description: I'm not gonna give you a detailed receipt of all the businesses I took over, started, sold, or destroyed. I won: that's all. I won everything I wanted.

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +2% Movement Speed per unique Algari gem color

spells.description:
Equip: Advance to the 50 Verses of Inner Resilience, reading as you are attacked.
Inner Resilience increases your armor by 3,764 and grants your attacks a chance to invoke a ward which absorbs 1.1 million Magic damage. When finished, sift through the passages to another chapter.
Use: Sift through the passages in the tome with increased Radiance. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

Use: Become Mudborne, absorbing 11.5 million damage and pulsing 567,732 Nature damage split between nearby enemies over 10 sec.

Periodic damage you take coalesces into pungent mud to feed the ritual, reducing this cooldown by 2.0 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)
Equip: Damaging a target has a low chance to call upon the power of the Blessed Weapon Grip, granting you 10 stacks that increase your highest secondary stat by 185. These stacks fade over 30 sec.
Equip: You champion the cause of Huojin Pandaren.  All reputation gains while in dungeons will be applied to your standing with them.
